command.start:
Hello, I am {botname}.
The language you use can be seen by using /me@{botid}.
If you want to use another language, please use /lang@{botid}.

uptime.message: This bot is currently running for {hour} hour {min} minutes {sec} seconds.

search.error: There was a problem sending your search results! Try {botid} google {keyword}!
search.desc_null: Go to the URL for more information!
search.bot_blcok: Due to Google's anti-bot policy, it is not searchable. Please try again in a few minutes.

img.error: There was a problem sending the image! Try it with {botid} img {keyword}!

lang.isgroup: You can not change the language in Group Chat. Thank you for your personal chat.
lang.announce: If you would like to change the language to use, please select from the list below.
lang.success: ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ The language to be used in English has changed.
lang.error: Failed to change language. Please try again.

help.name: Help
help.description:
Here's what this bot can do:
Click on one of the features below to learn how to use it!

img.name: Image search
img.description: You can search for images in Google.

start.name: Start
start.description:
This is a command to wake up the bot.
You can use this bot if you use this command.

uptime.name: Bot Uptime
uptime.description: You can see how long this bot has been running.

lang.name: Change your language
lang.description: Change the language to use here.

me.name: My Info
me.description: You can see your own information.

help.twice: Here are some tips you already have!

message.except: error. Stickers and images can not be processed.
message.botjoin: Hello, Thank you for allowing me to work in this room. Thank you very much.
